children.title: What is 3D Infinite?
children.desc: 3D Infinite is a platform that offers 3D models of modern luxury furniture, lighting, and decoration.

children.title: How can I browse and search for 3D models on your website?
children.desc: You can explore our catalog through various menus, filters, or by using the search bar.

children.title: Which software and render engines are compatible with your 3D models?
children.desc: Our models are compatible with 3ds Max and the Corona Render engine. We plan to include different formats in the future.

children.title: In what formats are the 3D models provided?
children.desc: We currently provide .max format and .obj files with textures, ready for use in your scenes.

children.title: Can I preview the 3D models before purchasing?
children.desc: Yes, you can preview the models using our generated preview images under studio lighting conditions.

children.title: How does the purchasing process work on 3D Infinite?
children.desc: We use a credit-based system, where each model has a different price. 1 credit equals $1, and the minimum purchase is $20. Credits have no expiration date.

children.title: What payment methods do you accept?
children.desc: You can make payments using credit/debit cards, PayPal, AmazonPay, or Wire Transfer through our FastSpring payment system.

children.title: Do you offer discounts or subscription plans?
children.desc: Currently, we do not offer discounts or subscription plans.

children.title: How are purchased 3D models delivered to users?
children.desc: Purchased models can be accessed in the 'Orders' section of your user account, and you can download them at any time.

children.title: What is the licensing agreement for the 3D models?
children.desc: Our models come with a general licensing agreement that allows both personal and commercial use.

children.title: Do you offer custom 3D modeling services?
children.desc: Yes, we provide custom modeling services. Contact us for more information.

children.title: Are there any restrictions on reselling your models on other platforms?
children.desc: Yes, reselling our models on other platforms is strictly prohibited.

children.title: Do you have user reviews and ratings for your models?
children.desc: We don't have user reviews and ratings at the moment, but we plan to add this feature in the future.

children.title: How often do you update your model inventory?
children.desc: We update our inventory with new models every week.

children.title: How can I contact customer support?
children.desc: You can find our contact information in the website footer and reach out to us via email.

children.title: Do you offer returns or refunds?
children.desc: We do not offer returns or refunds unless the model is broken or not functioning as expected.
